title: HELP PLEASE! Neue or New
content:
Can anyone tell me how this is supposed to be pronounced:

Helvetica NEUE

I've heard:

new and new-ay

I'm trying to settle a discussion in our studio.
author: umlautthoni

comments.content: Grot, thank you very much for responding, but would the noy be pronounced like joy?

Yes. But with an N. :^)

So “noye”. No pause between the u and the e.

[this](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415115337/http:/www.leo.org/dict/aussprache/n/Neue_Welt.wav) is direct link to a .wav which shows how to pronounce neue in german (its "Neue Welt", new world, so forget about the second word).

its a computer voice as you'll see, but its pretty accurate. "noy-a" sounds pretty wrong to me.

<cite>“noy-a” sounds pretty wrong to me.</cite>

I don’t know. It bends a bit in that direction, when you say it fast. If the faq read “noye”, all these english speakers would say “noï”.
